name: Lines.io
description:
Lines.io is a brand new addictive game！
The goal is pretty simple. Just compete with other competitors and round up them as much territory as possible!
Watch out and be careful! The game will be extremely competitive! A clash will happen anytime and anywhere! You need to have very good strategy!

HOW TO PLAY
Enclose an area and block with your string to capture new land.
Surround other planes by hitting their tails.
Don't be hit by other players.
Try to survive till the end!


Download now for free!
Join this game and beat people all around the world!
